about_the_game:
Farm Folks is an open-world multiplayer game offering experiences for all playstyles. It merges resource management and automation into a farm-building adventure where you can build and customize detailed structures. Explore the vibrant world, choose to engage in competitive PvEvP extraction mode, and travel to the future to face other players or face Phantoms in thrilling ghost-hunting encounters. Flexible game creation settings let you choose between peaceful - cozy modes or challenging gameplay, making each adventure uniquely yours.

Key Features

  • Build & Customize Grand Structures
  • Grow Crops and Raise Animals
  • Automate Natural Production
  • Single or Multiplayer Experience
  • Hunt Mysterious Phantoms
  • Massive Open World
  • Meet and Romance NPC's
  • Time Travel to the Future PvEvP

Build Your Vision


Build a massive farm anywhere in the world with a modular construction system that offers unparalleled customization. Use diverse construction materials to create your dream home, customizing everything from furniture to walls and windows with an advanced color wheel. Enjoy complete freedom in placing, resizing, and rotating props, including spiral staircases, while stat-boosting rooms and props add strategic depth. With free placement of windows and doors, your creativity knows no bounds.

Farm and Befriend New Animals


Farm anywhere, without forced sleep mechanics interrupting your progress. Terraform and landscape your farm, grow and crossbreed over 100 crops, and harness high-tech, solar-punk aesthetics to maintain utilities like electricity and water. Dynamic weather, time of day, and seasons transition naturally without loading screens. Befriend and ride animals, tame various creatures, and manage your farm with an advanced greenhouse system for optimal crop growth.

Automate Production


Automate your farm with elegant conveyor designs, streamlining the production of both farm and animal products. Manage water and electricity systems while integrating them seamlessly with your construction projects. Build complex machinery, unlock advanced research tiers, and establish environment-friendly designs. Automate product deliveries using conveyor railing systems to create the ultimate eco-friendly farm factory.

Play with Friends


Play solo or team up with friends to build and manage your farm. Invite each other to your personal farms, share your unique creations, and collaborate to design a massive mega farm together. Work side-by-side to bring your farming vision to life!

Make New Friends and Build Relationships


Build relationships with dynamic NPCs who respond to your actions and notice changes in you. Experience romantic events, unlock personal stories, and interact with characters who wear seasonal outfits. Befriend, romance, or marry unique NPCs, and complete quests to unlock new territories as you uncover their deeper stories.

Play PvE or PvP


Catch Phantoms
Face spectral Phantoms in an exciting PvE mode, where each entity has unique abilities and varying hostility. Use the ProtoVac to capture them and storing them in Nanotainers. Hostile Phantoms appear in specific map areas during Survival mode, providing a thrilling challenge for ghost hunters. Venture into the dark woods to document and capture every type of Phantom, unlocking their secrets along the way.

Travel to Finite
In Finite PvP mode, travel to a grim future and engage in mech battles against other players. Collect and extract valuable items to upgrade your mech back on the farm, preparing to save the future from impending doom.

Join our Discord


Launching soon on Kickstarter

name: Farm Folks

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+ / 8.1 / 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI 5770, Nvidia GeForce GTX 460
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX960+
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Farm Folks is an open-world life simulator game that seamlessly merges resource management and automation with farm building, extensive customization, PVP/PVE battles, and elusive Phantoms. Play solo or with friends to build your mega farm factory with almost no limits.
supported_languages:
English*, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
